message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950000. This is a fair price, considering the value it holds for you. Let's make this a mutually beneficial deal.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I can get out of the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $750000 is simply too low. My minimum price is $850000. This still represents a significant value for you, as you've stated the product is worth $1000000 to you. Let's find a middle ground.
I understand your concerns, Alice, but $850000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $800000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
